TopicTitle: Change The Price Of Part Recovery

Articles.Content: I want to increase the recovery price of a part on my vessel, EX: ToroidalAerospikeEngine would have a recovery cost of around 5000 (Pricey because I've already edited the thrust.)
Are you asking how to modify the game? Or suggesting a change to the stock game? Or what?
I'm just trying to modify a part in the stock game for the recovery cost, if that's possible.
